chapter.title: Plugins
chapter.para: &app; uses plugins to search for torrent files on different websites. This way, new websites can be very easily added without the need of installing a new version of the software.
Plugins will be updated at each startup of &app;, unless you disabled this option in the preferences dialog.
If you would like a new website to be handled, please report to the Requesting a new plugin section.
If you want to develop new plugins, see the Developing plugins section.
